website_summaries.verdict: This cooling towel comes in several sizes and is soft, not thick and leathery.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Holds its cool for a long time
Helps cool you down even when it isn't wet
cons: A good sports towel, but doesn't always cool as much as needed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. My dog stole it.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and compact. Perfect length. I ran it under water, squeezed out the excess, and my dog jumped onto my lap and layed on his back, so I put it on him. Dude fell asleep without moving for about an hour. I don't think I've seen him sleep that well all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool, helps reduce hot flashes too!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and airy. It stayed cool for 5 hours before I had to add water again. Helped with my hot flashes too (just wore it like a scarf all day and it seemed to reduce the intensity of the hot flashes). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: gnjames

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium size. I wasnt crazy about it dangling so long on my chest and thought I should go small. NOPE! I took that bad boy and wrapped it losely on my neck and tucked it in the back. Relief for my back too! Perfect for my 8 yr old as well. Cools very fast and the fabric is soft. Doesnt take as long to soak as other towels I've used. And dripping on my shirt is minimal. Overall I a great purchase for summer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: They cannot keep cool over an hour. Don’t buy it if they’re shipped directly from China. The towels shipped from a province in China are smaller in size. They don’t have printed logos so hell knows where they’re from. Fabric not the same. The towels are much less stretchy and don’t hold water well. Even though I tried to squeeze all water out, water still dropped and my shirt got wet in fifteen minutes. I bought six items in two separate orders that’s why I noticed the difference. Customer support is ineffective. Seven back and forth emails and they couldn’t provide a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I took this baby with me to my Yosemite trip to test it out, and it worked!! Idk what I was expecting out of it but it definitely worked. It kept me cool all throughout our hike up the waterfall! So if y'all are considering on purchasing this, please do. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like this but I was wrong I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ike Fauber

customer_reviews.title: yup, it is soft, and light weight, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to do some work in triple digit, humid, east Texas. I was hoping this towel would give some relief. Well, it did, sorta. If I was in the shade, it did cool some. If there was a breeze, it cooled some. If I was in an under-air-conditioned office with a fan, it cooled some. but bright sun? Not a bit. Just contributed to the dampness of my clothing from sweating. I tried 'snapping' it like they recommend, and repositioning it, but that would only help for a minute or so. It is lightweight, even wet. It does dry soft. But my clothing did get damp from it, but I may not have wrung it out well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Needham

customer_reviews.title: kept us very cool. We used them for our vacation to Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well these worked. My son had his on the entire week. So simple to use, kept us very cool. We used them for our vacation to Florida but I will definitely be utilizing them this summer for family outings and workouts.
customer_reviews.author: ncarv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an overheating Frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my French bulldog who overheats easily. A quick soak, wring and I drape it over her portly body and she’s not panting anymore. Feels great on my skin, really is cooling. Lightweight and good size for tying, draping or folded.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I love these cooling towels! They really do work - they get quite cold, stay cold for a while, and don't feel very wet as long as you wring them out and snap them properly. I definitely recommend them. Also, a shout-out to Alamo/S&L Products customer support! One of my cooling towels came in its little bag but was missing a carabiner. I messaged them and asked if it would be possible for them to send me a replacement carabiner. They not only sent me one, they sent several to compensate for the inconvenience!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: First let's be honest, "cooling" towel are bs. If anything i would say it's a more efficient wet towel. Does a great job of absorbing the heat from my skin without the heavy wet towel feeling (still feels damp but light). But you don't feel any "cooling" effect until to take it off to snap it (which i do every 30mins). That being said it's really comfortable to wear, good material, easy to pack and I can wrap it around my head like a Hijab. Which comes in handy when you're working working long hours in the Texas Sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best cooling towels we've found.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Hawaii and do outdoor sports all year long so I bought 5 towels for my kids to take to soccer games last year. The kids fought over them so much I bought 10 more this year and personalized them as gifts. The vinyl didn't alter the integrity of the towels and everyone loved them. They are the perfect size and weight. They have been tugged and stretched by groups of 8 - 11 year old boys and they maintain their shape and function. We've tried multiple versions of cooling towels and these are by far our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AP Reed

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Cool (cool, haha, get it)
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected, seriously, this product is amazing! Bought for my hubby and I to use on our trip to the Grand Canyon, and they helped tremendously. We went in the middle of August, and these made a big difference in tolerating the desert heat, and stayed pretty cold for a few hours in those conditions! They are long so you can wrap them around your neck as a scarf, fold them for double thickness, or tie them around your head. I also use them when I have bad migraines! Just wet, ring out a bit, and place on forehead while laying down, and it helps ease my throbbing head. Purchase these now and you will be happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona And I have an Air conditioner, but it isn’t the best and unit I can get it fixed I have to be a little creative The extra Lg one is perfect. I tried another one before I bought this one. I thought it was going to be like this one, but it was definitely not like this one. This one is very light weight and vey soft, even when wet. My dogs like also they come and curl up next to me! I will be ordering more of this one and a few more of the other sizes and only the Alfamo brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalynn White

customer_reviews.title: Really made a difference! Working outside in the Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: Really made a difference! Working outside in the Florida heat & humidity is tough, this made it a bit easier!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS GREAT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works so great it has made life in the heat so much more bearable my husband works outside all day even in weather over 100 degrees and this thing has made him so much happier it's easy to use and it's just flat out amazing I think I'm going to buy a couple more for my kids when they play outside when it's hot
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: For repeated use and dries soft
customer_reviews.text: My head and face are the first things to sweat when I'm hot, which causes my glasses to fog up while taking photos--very frustrating. I've used this scarf, which I wrap around my neck, several times and am VERY pleased with how cool it stays. You don't even have to use cool water, just snap it and it cools down. If it begins to loose the cool feel, just add a little more water, snap it again, and it cools down quickly. When it dries, it is soft--not stiff like a lot of products. It really helps to keep me cool. I haven't tried it in temperatures over 82 degrees, but am hoping it will continue to help.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must have!
customer_reviews.text: When I found out that the temps for the July 2019 Ann Arbor art festival were going to be in the 90's. I ordered two of the large cooling towels, they were lifesavers in the extreme heat! I was able to walk 6 miles in the heat with this towel! Very lightweight and refreshing to have. Follow the instructions to wash prior to using! Glad I read that before I left for my trip! I highly recommend and wish I knew about these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated, good value for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: What I really liked was the ease of use, and the fact that it really WORKED as described! To many products now a days are touted as superior but when you actually use them it’s a different story. This product does keep you cool on hot sunny days. It is large enough to cover your head or neck/ shoulders area in cooling relief from the hot sun. Great product, recharges easily with fresh water, works as stated. What more could you want? Buy one, use it, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Broadwing

customer_reviews.title: Good product good company
customer_reviews.text: This towel works really well. The mesh fabric is more comfortable than some of the heavier fabric cooling towels I've used. You also just snap that towel one the coolness starts to go away and it cools down again so reduces the need to soak the towel over and over. Lastly their customer service was great. They solicited feedback after the purchase and they took my feedback and took action on it. The towels need to be washed before the first use because the color bleeds on the initial use. I learned that the hard way but Alfamo took care of my concern promptly!
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling towels for very hot weather
customer_reviews.text: First I bought two extra large ones for myself, to keep me cool on long walks and doing yard work in hot weather. I liked them so much that within a week I bought four more extra large ones and one full-body towel. I gave away most of those as gifts and then bought myself another full-body towel. That's eight purchased in about a week. Crazy. I love these things. They look great, and they feel good. Don't rule out the full-body towel. It's smaller than its name suggests, and it's versatile. You can wear it around your neck or even over part of your face as a sun shield.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vranicar

customer_reviews.title: This towel saved me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel at the last minute because an ultramarathon I was signed up for was going to have uncharacteristically hot weather. The terrain was exposed and sunny with temps in the mid-90s. I still suffered but I suspect I would not have been able to finish the race without this towel. It does indeed hold water and cools substantially better than a normal bandanna or buff. I got it in small because it fit easily in a run vest and was more than adequate to wrap around my neck or under my cap as flaps.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Kuo

customer_reviews.title: amazingly cool and not at all cumbersome or heavy
customer_reviews.text: Incredible.....I wet, wrung, shook and wrapped around my neck.....amazingly cool and not at all cumbersome or heavy. Three hours later I picked it up and it was still cold and damp to the touch despite being in the house with the fire on and having cooked dinner in all within 10 ft of this towel. Really looking forward to using this outdoors on a run and when I mow the grass etc. I will update if anything changes. At this point I am impressed, would recommend and will buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Britchic

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is nice, but did not feel any special cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this towel to help keep me cool playing Pickleball (great sport, by the way). The scarf fabric is nice and very soft. It is good that it can be wrapped around my neck nicely, leaving the ends free for use in wiping sweat away (I purchased the 40"). I believe I followed the instructions correctly by wetting it and snapping the towel to activate the cooling part. However, I have not noticed that it feels any different than just a wet scarf. When you are hot, a wet scarf feels good, so I'll keep it and use it, but I don't think the cooling part advertised is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and it worked just as it claimed! I took it on my vacation and used it a lot. I have MS and the heat really affects me terribly. This was amazing! When it starts to warm up a little from body heat, just shake it out and it becomes cool again. As long as the towel is wet, you can keep using it. Once the towel starts to dry, just re-wet and you’re good to go. These would be great for workouts, yard work etc.... I also gave some as gifts. I’d highly recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: lodaox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooling towels !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality cooling towels for my weekend hikes in southern CA! Easy to use and it has kept me cool for a few hours. I just re-wet the towel for longer hikes. I have purchased a several and after using them, purchased another set. The color selection is great and would definitely recommend this product. Several of my friends have purchased the red ones for their Disneyland trip! Great communication from seller and quick shipment !
customer_reviews.author: 2bella

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool, calm and collected under the heat
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cooling towel that does what it advertises. Very durable and perfect for hot and humid days on the golf course. Get the large one as it covers your head and shoulders while you wait for your turn to putt. Very light weight and fits in your back pocket as you putt out. After four plus hours in the sun this product is an energy saver.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a warehouse packing boxes and running palettes back and forth though isles and it gets pretty hot and my face feels like it's sunburned all the time so I bought this. I didn't expect this towel to work as good as it does! What a difference it makes my work day! I love the length I got because it's not too long and I can press my cheeks with both ends while it is wrapped on my neck. I am buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Disney was so much more tolerable than we expected by using these cooling towels. They lasted all day and were large enough to wrap around our necks twice . We did not put these in the washing machine but instead hand washed them with warm water and soup, and hung to dry them, and they were fine. After reading the reviews about this cooling towel I decided to purchase and they did not disappoint! Husband bought two more!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm relatively new to, well, heat susceptibility. I've always sweat, always felt it, but I have only recently begun to suffer from it. To find myself slowing down, seeking air conditioning, etc. There are a lot of reasons, but mostly...I'm over fifty. I tried this on a whim, at this year's San Diego Comic Con. Worked exactly as indicated. Beyond the cooling effect, however? It works great to blot up perspiration, and doesn't look stupid doing it. You can wear it as a scarf, a headdress, or a kneckerchief. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep you cool, and is foldable when dry
customer_reviews.text: I have spent some time (and money) trying to find a good cooling towel for Disney. This Alfamo has been tested in our delightfully hot, humid, Maryland summer, and I have to say it works pretty well. You do have to keep it moist, and snap it now and then. But it definitely helps to keep you cool. I like it better than the FroggTogg for traveling (even though the FroggTogg keeps you cooler). Unfortunately, the FroggTogg dries like a piece of solid foam. The Alfamo is much more pliable, and dries like material. Easy to put in your backpack when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamaloon

customer_reviews.title: I was hot in every way except the good kind. Friends recommended a cooling towel and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my AC in my classroom was jacked and CA was having a heatwave. Additional challenge: hot flashes. I was hot in every way except the good kind. Friends recommended a cooling towel and I got this one at random so it would be delivered to School the next day. I love it! It kept me cool without wetting my clothes and now I use it for biking, hiking, and kayaking. I want to get the purple one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: These towels really do stay cool
customer_reviews.text: I live in Texas and we have been having summer temps in the high 90s with a "feels like" 110. My granddaughters play soccer and at their first game they were about to drop from the heat. I came home and ordered these towels for all the girls and the parents. They really stay cool! It was the high 90s last weekend and the towels not only kept them cool, mine kept me cooled off also. (I also noticed that a lot of other teams had the same towels). Guess amazon was really busy shipping orders!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Effective in keeping you cool in the hot summer heat
customer_reviews.text: I used this while on vacation in Italy in late August when its crazy hot and sunny. I sweat a lot so I bought this this to keep me cool or at least wipe sweat off and not having to use my hands. It was very effective in keeping me cool and that made me not have to sweat as much. I used it kind of like a scarf. I tried going without it to see and it was a big difference. I highly recommend using something like this if you are going to be out in the heat for prolonged periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Used the towel for the first time last night. It was 114 here in Arizona last night for football practice. I wet the towel, pulled on it and it got cool. I didn't even have to re-wet it during the 2.5 hour practice. The carrying case and clip are an extra bonus. I can clip the towel directly to my son's football bag. It has been washed once so far and came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works as a head wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This cooling towel works great. I bought this cooling towel for a friend of mine that is going through chemo treatment. Major discomforts she experiences are hot flashes and a very itchy, sensitive scalp even after the hair loss. This product helps with both of those. I purchased the longer towel so that she could easily wrap it on her head as if it were a scarf. She loves it. And I am so happy it is bringing her the relief that she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works & Feel WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I love the mesh material these are made out of. Even if the cooling effect didn't work (but it does and its cool! *pun intended*) I'd still want to use this as a face towel because it feels so lovely. I got the longer one and I'm glad I did. I can have this cover half of my head by letting it loop over my pony tail, hang down the back of my neck, and still have enough of the ends left to tuck under the chest-strap of my backpack to keep in place. Will be taking this to an Orlando vacation in September so hopefully, that'll help with the heat and humidity!
customer_reviews.author: JustJessee

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter to use during marching band practice in the stupid Arizona heat. (It's seriously hot here) During one of our summer monsoon storms, we lost power. It was estimated to come back on sometime the next morning. That meant a nasty July night without air conditioning. I was grumpy and not looking forward to this hot night that I'm sure I wouldn't sleep through. I had purchased 3 of these towels, one for each of us. Followed the directions, layed it over my body like a small blanket, and it kept me cool the whole night. Very happy with how these things work! I would totally recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A travel companion had one of these while we were camping in the Sahara and I was so impressed that I ordered one immediately and brought on a trip to Indochina. It was a lifesaver during long waits at Angkor Wat with 100 degree temps! I have recommended to several others who have purchased and agree with its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cools you when the temperatures soar.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to the Middle East. I used it extensively in over 100 degree weather, and it definitely works well! Renew it with more water and snap to activate it every half hour or so. My husband used his as a turban on his head while I draped mine around my neck and shoulders and sighed in relief at the coolness. The medium size worked well for us as we could use it in multiple ways. I think I would have had heatstroke without it.
customer_reviews.author: mllcal

customer_reviews.title: If it is hot where you live you need to get this towel!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels. When it is hot I bring out the towel to soak in water and put around my shoulders. The towel keeps you cool for hours. When it starts to warm up all you do is have to give it a snap and bam, it’s cool again. It doesn’t really need cool water even, just any water will do. ( probably not hot water, haven’t tried that though) I have had it for several months and it still Looks The same as It did when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Qualm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was offered in product description. Stayed cool all day for me. Just wet it with water, snap and a nice cooling towel. Wrapped it around my neck and did my chores. No cooler and a 100 degree plus day. Really helped. When i rested I just snapped again and wrapped my head. Really cooled off. Love these towels.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son to use while cutting lawns. While the idea of a cooling towel sounded great in theory, this one just didn't do much of anything. He's used it for a couple of weeks now and says it's fine for wiping sweat, but doesn't do much in the way of preventing it.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONADDICTEDMOMMY

customer_reviews.title: They work well and are versatile
customer_reviews.text: These towels do their job. I used them for a Disney World trip for a week and they were excellent. On top of cooling, they also provided good sun protection for my shoulders (I wear tank tops) in the areas of the parks where there was no shade. I also used it as a bandanna several times.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Spectrum kid!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old Autistic child is always going and getting a rag and wetting it then throws it on the floor till next day he will go get another. This Cooling towel is great it stays moist but not wet and very cold and its long he plays with it. Best thing is the next day for about 3 days he does not have to re-wet.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Just a handy handy sweat rag in general
customer_reviews.text: Now this is cool. No. Really. Lol. I used to wrap a bar towel around my neck to pull out the heat...this towel is wonderful. I like the snap to re-cool the towel.... That's really sweet...can be used on the wrist too...acrost the shoulders, just love this cold towel.... Ok cooler towel.. Use at the gym or outside in the sun...it pulls heat out of your blood,thus cooling your system.....rinse often or wrap an ice cube as it melts the towel will hold the water...use a couple ice cubes if your really running hot tho,as it is a real chiller alone rinsed in cold water to start....enjoy
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time when I had to spend 4 1/2 hours working in the full sun on a 90 degree day - something I'm not used to doing. I didn't end up with heat stroke but I've learned it's no joke and you can't just power your way through. You need to take precautions. The cooling towel was a big help. I also liked that I was able to get it in my favorite colors. That's always nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Useable but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: What I like: they’re lightweight and soft to touch (both when wet and when dry), they are machine washable. What I don’t like: they don’t stay cold as long as I thought they would, its wetness extends to the the clothing I wear and my hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pharo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used towel just once on warm day while golfing. Placed damp towel in enclosed bag and inadvertently left it in direct sun. Man, the towel really absorbed the heat! Be aware that towel should always be in the shade to retain coolness. Duh! Once cooled down, the towel was cool to the touch and when losing coolness waving in the air cooled it down nicely. Especially like the softness of the towel unlike the rubbery Frogg towels. Recommended to fellow golfers and they are now purchasing your item. Do I get a commission?
customer_reviews.author: Lovehategolf

customer_reviews.title: It tamed the hot Georgia summer heat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of the top selling cooling towels and this is the ONLY ONE thats really works... it is smooth and silky/slinky and long enough to use in many different ways... the other two I purchased were thick and had an almost leathery feel to them, not comfortable at all... this cooling towel is the ONLY ONE to tame the heat and sun of a Middle Georgia summer... this one is a *prince* you dont want a *frog*😊
customer_reviews.author: JanBrown

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for throwing around your neck while working out. It's nice & cool and you can just grab an end to wipe your face. It very light weight. Soak in water a few minutes, then wring dry. I perspire heavily since being on a bloodthinner and this is a lifesaver! I told my friend about it and now he wants one for working outside. Great idea! No offensive smell.
customer_reviews.author: GLK

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about buying this product but after seeing the reviews I had to try it out for myself. I purchased the medium size towel so that I can take it with me on . After trying this product I was amazed. I don't know the science behind this product but this is one of the best invention that is out today. My next purchase I will be purchasing the largest one.
customer_reviews.author: ratism

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for staying cool when exercising
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases. When I walk my dog or exercise, I perspire, especially in back of my head and my hair is soaked. I had a different kind for an African trip and it worked o.k. Since I needed a new one, I thought I would try the Alfamo towel. It is truly amazing at keeping me cool. No more sweaty head. After a while, when it seems less cool, I just remove it, snap it a couple of times, re wrap, and I am “cool” again. These will be great gifts for my active family. Might even be good got hot flashes. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dellio

customer_reviews.title: helped keep me cool in the Grand Canyon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooling towel for a rim-to-rim Grand Canyon hike in June. I have to say, it really did help keep me cool. I wet it as often as I could, & snapping it did cool it off even when it was not super wet. I used it around my shoulders primarily and sometimes put it on my head under my hat & it helped cool down my head. I'll be taking it with me on summer hikes from now on. It washed up nicely as well--it got pretty dirty at the GC, dropped it in the red dirt once too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stiff and cardboard-like!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased another highly-rated cooling towel for Burning Man, and washed before use as recommended. They dry like lavash! It's a cracker towel! Why do none of the reviews say that? Thankfully, there was enough time to order these and wash before our departure. These work great, do not dry stiff, and were very helpful on the days the temperatures neared 100. We bought a couple extra to gift, and they were very much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Mgmt NinjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Delightful, cooling towel
customer_reviews.text: I live in south Florida where the summer heat is stifling. I don’t smoke in the house but on the porch on which are upholstered chairs, overlooking the street. I read many reviews on this towel and these work! All that’s required is to run cold water on them, snap them a few times then wrap them around your neck. Because so much heat escapes from one’s head and neck, the towel cools you right down. They’re advertised to be used for sports but they’re great for cooling down!
customer_reviews.author: LitChick

customer_reviews.title: They keep your body cool enough to get through the worst hot tasks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these towels for use in our northern AZ home and our Phx area home. My husband has to mow over a 1/2 acre every other week in generall 110-115 temps. I tried for years to get him to wear a cooling towel with no luck. He finally came in the house one day with near heat exhaustion and decided to try the towel the next time he went out. Now he doesn't spend hours doing yard work with out one. They keep your body cool enough to get through the worst hot tasks. I would recommend these to anyone spending any extended length outdoors or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Gpines

customer_reviews.title: Snap towel Really works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Today is the first day of relief since my hot flashes have started and I must say this product is the bomb-diggity. I am required to wear an imperviable lab jacket that makes me feel like I am melting. I wore it today for the first time and it really did make a huge difference. Thank you for making this fabulous product and for answering my prayers. I ordered two, one for work and one for the house. I may have to order a dozen more just in case I lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio native

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling towel. Try it. You'll love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cooling towel and it was recommended by a friend. It's amazing the temperature drop when you place it around your neck or on your face. I just bought the one and will be buying more. Very sturdy and soft construction. A must have in this hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is
customer_reviews.text: its like basketball shorts fabric.... they get warm within seconds of putting it on your neck. it really is no different than using a regular towel. anything will be cooler when you wet it and wave it in the air.... i bought these for me and my son to use during his baseball tournament in 105 degree weather... we left these in the cooler and used our mister instead. If youre looking to keep cool... look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far. It kept me cool during a work out at the Y. The length is good, I wrap it around my neck, instead of letting it just hang over my shoulder. Worked out for an hour, the towel remained cool during that time. So far a great product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling towel, not good face covering
customer_reviews.text: Initially I bought this as a "mask" as shown in the photo. Too much fabric and too cumbersome to be a practical Covid mask. Breathing thru it is similar to a triple layer traditional mask. This is a good cooling towel for the hot weather and is soft enough it could be a winter scarf in moderately cold climates. Since I live in a high humidity part of the country during the summer, the cooling effect is moderate, but still good while working outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tres Texas

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT. WOW. Stays cool and just shake to get it cool all over again. I gave it away to the poor FED EX DRIVER! Going to buy 3 more not sure if for gifts or people who come visit on my porch or both! Yep make a great gift for those going to Gym, camping, (I have hypertension so cools until my medicine kicks in) Outdoors, indoors, working outside...ANYWHERE.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: The original is much better...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I thought this would be the same as the chill pal cooking towel which was the original cooling towel and works almost as good as an ice pack. This product is not that. I use when playing golf in the heat and this product was just a wet towel on my neck with no cold feeling at all! Just tossed in trash and ordered the other. The other towel is made of different material closer to rubber feel and some have complained about that and it also dries hard but softens again when you apply water. It simply provides a better cool relief than this Alfamo product.
customer_reviews.author: goodnplenty64

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling towels
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these cooling towels. We bought them to use at Disney in the heat of summer. They were lightweight but held the coolness of the water for about 2 hours. We wore them around our necks, even put one end down the front and back of our shirts. The length was great for this. I do wish there had been shorter versions for our grandchildren as they didn’t like it wrapped around their necks so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Chill summers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these towels because of the hot/humid weather in NYC! Im usually a complainer when I’m having to be out in the sun. I tried it out while having to run my errands and now having to wait in line (due to Social distancing) means longer time in the nasty weather! But I was okay with that, I was even outside doing yard work and had no complaints because this towel did it’s thing! Bike rides and hikes will be more tolerable now in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Charina Redugerio

customer_reviews.title: Each individual should have two towels then you will enjoy the benefits of these cool off towels!
customer_reviews.text: Cools you off just right, but you really need two towels. The reason is they warm up very quickly. Keep one in the cooler with ice and rotated every 5 to 10 minutes. Then you will enjoy it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Best vacation purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have survived a week in Italy and Spain without this towel. I'd wet it in the morning, then 3-4 more times through the day. It was a lifesaver, the difference between being miserable and comfortable on long walks in the hot sun. I wore it from morning til night on my neck. I won't travel without one again! Also I'd like to note that I'd also bought a shirt (elsewhere) that supposedly cools you when it's wet, and it was a huge disappointment. This towel is 10x better than one of those shirts.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this towel, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This towel is amazing and does what it is supposed to do! Its easy to use, run through water, ring it out, and snap it in the air! It is instantly cooling you down. No dripping, long enough to stay around your neck while doing cardio workouts. I just bought another one for my boyfriend who can overheat easily and I know he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS (indoors), just ok outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I’m just starting an exercise program after 15 years of being pretty much a workoholic! I started playing pickleball in Florida and needed something to help me cool down. This towel really works (indoors). Gets so coolwith this towel, I almost get too cold between games. It WORKS!! Tried it outside - mid summer - during a walk and it worked fine but not as great as inside. Like it so much I bought one for my husband and my two sisters! Admittedly I’m somewhat surprised how well it works (indoors)! Ok outdoors but not as amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many positive reviews, I purchased 2, (one for me, and one for my husband.) I'm not impressed. Although the fabric is soft, it did not have the "cooling" sensation described. It certainly did not change temperature as described, (no matter how many times I "snapped" it.) It felt like any other wet towel would feel, just a bit softer. I can't say it stayed wet longer either. In my opinion, it's not more effective than any other soft towel would be. Beyond that, the chemical smell was VERY strong when I opened it. I washed it 4 times (more than they even suggested,) and the smell remains...though not as strong, it is still unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Linton

customer_reviews.title: Love Cooling Towel!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is everything that everything said! It cools you off and keeps you cool for hours. However, I would highly recommend getting a larger size if you are buying for a male that is 5'10" or taller. I purchased the Large thinking that it would be long enough to wrap around your neck and head and unfortunately, it will only wrap around your neck. I just ordered the XL, as that should provide the ability to do both simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a while
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to use at work in a steel warehouse in Texas. One for me and one for whoever. My boss decided to get her hands dirty one August day and I let her BORROW the blue one. I won't say she stole it, but she won't give it back. At the extreme temps I work in it only seems to work for maybe an hour before the effectiveness/benefit wears off. Snapping it 3 times every hour doesn't cut it. After a while all they do is soak up sweat. But they do cool me off considerably at first and I am doing manual labor while I am wearing it so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cuicuic

customer_reviews.title: Hot no more
customer_reviews.text: Buy this now! Game changer! You may need to set a reminder in your phone for occasions it may be hot, as my only complaint is on me when I do not have it with me for hot days/events/situations. Works just as advertised! I could write for hours of the times I wished I had it handy, or times I was the luckiest person in the world to have it handy. The largest size is a must! Imagine sweating like you are in the core of the earth, but you dump some water on the largest size, then COVER yourself like you are in bed to only get so cool you have goosebumps....live this experience if you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️POTS- fashionable AND they WORK!!! ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Best I have found and here’s why! Dx with POTS and heat sensitive. Took to Italy and wore as a fashionable scarf. Easy to fold in bag and when wet was a shaw and NOT noticable as a cooling towel. Lasted for hours- Italy in June!🔥 My only regret was not buting more to jazz up more outfits!
customer_reviews.author: MGY

customer_reviews.title: Desert-tested, compact and great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as birthday gifts for my sister and brother-in-law for their trip to the desert in mid-May ... and they raved about them. They said they were a lifesaver for their national park hikes and really helped them keep cool. I like the fact that they come with a pouch to keep them moist and a carbiner clip for your backpack/bag. I might be ordering one for myself for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyWhirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cool towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, who works outdoors in the Florida heat. The first week he used them temperatures were in the mid 90s and he was very happy to have had them. He used one as a neck wrap and tied one around his forehead for a cooling sweatband. These towels are everything they're advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseygirl

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing - they saved our family during our outing to an amusement park while under a heat advisory, with heat indices in the triple digits. we wore them around our necks, and on our heads, under our hats, and it made it possible for us to enjoy a few hours more than we would have been able to survive otherwise. The cooling effect was instant, once we wet the towels, and the cooling effect lasted a while before needing to re-wet the towels to refresh the cooling. I highly recommend these towels - they truly were a lifesaver for us. The were totally comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Alfamo works
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Alfamo towels. A friend gave me my first. I have other brands-very plasticy and sticky. Alfamo is light, stays cool, re-cools with a snap..i have now ordered 2 additional Alfamo-long and short, the short to try on my head under a hat-I suffered a severe heat stroke and these are unbelievably helpful. i'd give them 100 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Keep Cool
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. It’s lightweight enough even when wet to wear as a scarf. It makes being outside in hot weather more tolerable. The material has not snagged with repeated use. I ended up buying another for my husband who works in construction. I like that there is a nice assortment of colors available.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli L. Wright-bobholz

customer_reviews.title: these really do work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Disney trip and my family was incredulous regarding their function. That first day we used them that incredulousness fell away. These cool you down so much it makes hot humid weather tolerable. We took a trip back to Hawai`i to visit family and ended up in a very hot basement apartment on the North shore and these allowed my wife and I to get some sleep. We played the wet towels on us lie blanket and it was like we had Air-conditioning. I would recommend to anyone traveling in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: NOT color fast so WILL bleed onto your t-shirt or any fabric its resting against
customer_reviews.text: - Dye used is NOT color fast. It WILL bleed. In my case, was wearing it indoors to try it out. It bled the blue dye into our couch (a real mess to clean up) and the shirt I was wearing. - Water evaporates pretty quickly and has to be re-wet - While wet it does cool pretty well - Is Comfortable to wear I did return the towels. Thank you Amazon for standing behind your customers. Because of the color dye bleeding out, I can't recommend the towel.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Great

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I gave this away as a gift to my cousin who was always walking around the house with a wet dishtowel around her neck to cool her down due to hot flashes. 6 months last she moved to Puerto Rico, and 6 months after that she tells me she can't live without it. She loves it. So much better than a wet dishtowel. Keeps cool much longer (and looks better too).
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Gets very cold and stays cold longer than anything I've used!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was just age that sun and heat was really getting to me, even making me feel sick. But it IS getting hotter outside now and everywhere. I vowed to never again be out in the sun without sun umbrella, even for hiking. On my last camping trip, I wore this around my neck and at home during a heat wave, and it really made a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Katgo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these! I plan to buy more. I have MS so I overheat very easily. I train with a personal trainer 5 days a week and have always struggled when I start to sweat and get really hot. I used this for the first time today. It's so soft! I kept it wrapped around my neck through my entire workout. It was perfect to pull up to my face to cool off. I can confidently say this will improve my workouts and allow me to keep going when I'd normally need a break to cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Krull

customer_reviews.title: Ummm, your choice
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of this. It doesn't keep you as cool as the frog togg, I didn't like the material, felt like something that would be used in men's swim shorts with added fabric. Did not stay cool for a long time, had to rewet it constantly. It's super soft but not worth it to me personally. Frog togg was definitely the way to go. My opinion though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth half as much as you'll pay.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for a better towel. It's "okay" and is definitely not anything special compared to others on the market. Also, the logo melted together on the towel after first wash so there is that. It's cheap. I should of bought the ones at half the price as they're just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer N. Jonson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cooling towel 😀
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. I have several different brands of cooling towels that I have tried and this one is my favorite. It stays cold throughout my gym classes no problem. I love that after I wash it (In washing machine) that it doesn't go hard when i hang dry it. Didn't think that would make a difference to me but it really has. Easy to carry around I'm the pouch it came in. The purple color is vibrant and material is really soft. Oh plus it's super long which is great for if I want to hang it around my neck. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle towel...it's soft, lightweight and just simply fabulous! Don't hesitate to order this item. I have activated it in the morning and it's still cool late into the evening (Although, this is not a claim in the description). I ordered 4 between myself, family and friends and everyone loves it! It's truly a 2016 product! I have used cooling towels/ bandanas over the years and this product, by far surpassed my expectations! Keep in mind, the instructions are on the storage bag you receive and they are challenging to read because of the light print. Just follow the instructions and you'll be nothing but happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TinVA

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy All Year
customer_reviews.text: This towel has been one of the best purchases I've ever made. I have a chronic illness that makes me overheat easily. During the summer I can get so hot it becomes dangerous. This towel helps keep me cooler than I would be otherwise. It is also wonderful for when I have one of my frequent migraine headaches. I have recommended it to friends and family. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: imapickypicker

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly, it kept me cool during a NY heat wave
customer_reviews.text: It really does what it advertises. I play summer golf in the northeast and it gets hot and humid. I needed a solution to keep my body heat manageable. This impressively worked, and it easily lasted the entire 4.5 hour round. Would buy again and have already recommended it to my buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Yoba1

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Towels
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty well on warm days to help keep you cool. Snapping them really does make them cooler for a short period of time. It's helpful if you have access to water throughout the day. We used ours at Cub scout camp and were able to get them wet often. The bag ripped after a few days. All three of our bags did, actually and that's the number one reason for a star deduction. The clip was helpful while the bag was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and it works
customer_reviews.text: I liked it much better than the cooling vest when used on my motorcycle. It was more comfortable than the cooling vest and gave me adequate cooling. I have perforated leather on my chest region of my jacket which is where I hung the vest. I am not sure how long this cooling will last. Perhaps an hour. I notice I needed to go over 40 mph before it gave me its maximum cooling. I bought a bigger towel to see if that works better.
customer_reviews.author: DavidTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Same product WAY pricier.
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product but I bought 3 of these as Christmas presents and then a 6 pack of "cheaper" ones ($16.99 for all 6, same size) as stocking stuffers for other people. Turns out they were the exact same product with a different name slapped on (95% sure of this). The other brand is called SYOURSELF. Trust me on this lol. Still deciding what to do with these. I didnt gift them since they were no nicer than the stocking stuffers. 2 stars because I still like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use to keep cool in hot weather. It's clingy, even soggy, and did not stay cool. Color is not as bright as shown on model because black is in the weave. Disappointed. I have two old neck wraps (cannot remember name of material) which worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Penina

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: I use for dog, and he chooses to lay on it when offered, and he KNOWS where to find the coolest spot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a face covering and a cooling towel.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cooling towels! They are lightweight and make it easy to breathe when worn as a face covering.. I bought them to wear instead of a mask when walking for extended periods. I have asthma and breathing through a mask for extended periods has been hard. These appear to be a good alternative and I am breathing better when walking. And they cool effectively too. I left mine around my neck on the car ride home and I was almost too cold!
customer_reviews.author: sharon delashmit

customer_reviews.title: A must in hot outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in the jungle, Disneyworld and places all over the country. I like this towel as it is very lightweight and does a great job at cooling during outdoor activities. Even in the humid areas of Florida and the jungle it did a very good job. It does better in drier climates, but also dries out much faster. I keep one in my travel bag and backpack for those summer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Must have for work outs or in humid weather!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii and have been using cooling towels for years. However, not until I bought this brand did I realize the other brands really were not working as they should. This is the Lexus, the Tesla or cooling towels. I don’t know how they engineered it but I’m glad they did. I simply wet it and wear it; simple. No formula to make sure it works; like cold water, freezer, snap, crackle or pop..... NO, just wet and wear. It stays cool (and comfortable) for hours. It’s lightweight, soft and does not hold an odor. I simply wear, hand wash and repeat. Great product. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jai R

customer_reviews.title: not as good as PVA towels
customer_reviews.text: It's a polyester (i think) fabric strip that if you get wet will cool you. It does cool you if you get it wet. It does not cool you nearly as well as the PVA towels. At best it cools you about as good as a wet cotton t-shirt. the t-shirt has the advantage of being body conforming, so i'd use that before i'd use this. if you just want any old rag that's easy to pack to cool you off in a pinch, this will do. for myself, this didn't cut mustard and i'm ordering PVA towels instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Todd
